actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the contemporaneous recordkeeping requirement and certain other recently enacted provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement added by the Tax Reform Act of 1984 relating to the maintenance of contemporaneous records with respect to: (1) business travel expenses, including automobile expenses; (2) business entertainment expenses; and (3) expenses for gifts.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the contemporaneous recordkeeping requirement and certain other recently enacted provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
